info.title: wiliwili
info.author: xfangfang
info.details:
wiliwili is an Unofficial 3rd party Bilibili client, which provides switch users with the possibility to watch videos from Bilibili.

Bilibili is a video website mainly for Chinese users, so the default language setting is Chinese.

Because of copyright issues, videos refreshed using this app are different in different regions of the world.

 v1.5.2 更新说明 :
- 【修复】PSV 开启缩放后，全屏视频下方有一像素背景色
- 【修复】PSV ABXY 按钮交换功能失效
- 【新增】Linux 播放性能提升（需要系统支持EGL）
- 【新增】PC 和 NS 支持自定义键盘快捷键
- 【新增】PC 端按键操作时自动隐藏鼠标
- 【新增】直播间新样式（入口：界面设置 -> 直播间侧边栏弹幕数量）
- 【新增】消息对话框支持跳转番剧视频消息
- 【修复】消息对话框点击崩溃
- 【修复】修复直播间无弹幕问题
- 【修复】部分用户无法正常获取视频链接
- 【修复】排行榜页面不更新的问题

 Change log:
- [Fix] PSV After enabling scaling, there is a one-pixel line below the video

- [New] Customizable hotkeys now supported on PC and Nintendo Switch
- [New] New live room UI style (toggle under UI → Live Sidebar Danmaku Count)

- [Fixed] Crash when clicking in some message dialogs
- [Fixed] Live room danmaku not appearing
